nationality.label: What is your nationality?
nationality.strlen: Your nationality must be 500 characters or less.

country.label: Which country have you come from?
country.required: Enter the country you have come from.
country.strlen: The country you have come from must be 500 characters or less.
country.change: Change which country have you come from

lastCameToUK.legend: What date did you last come to the UK?
lastCameToUK.required: Enter the date that you last came to the UK.
lastCameToUK.format: Enter a real date that you last came to the UK.
lastCameToUK.future: Enter a date that you last came to the UK that is in the past.
lastCameToUK.change: Change what date you last came to the UK

cameToUkToWork.legend: Did you come to the UK to work?
cameToUkToWork.required: Select yes if you came to the UK to work.
cameToUkToWork.change: Change whether you came to the UK to work

noRecourseToPublicFunds.legend: Does your passport say you have no recourse to public funds?
noRecourseToPublicFunds.required: Select yes if your passport says you have no recourse to public funds.
noRecourseToPublicFunds.change: Change whether your passport says you have no recourse to public funds

livedInUkBefore.legend: Have you lived in the UK before?
livedInUkBefore.required: Select yes if you have lived in the UK before.
livedInUkBefore.change: Change whether you have lived in the UK before

lastLeftUK.legend: What date did you last leave the UK?
lastLeftUK.required: Enter the date that you last left the UK.
lastLeftUK.format: Enter a real date that you last left the UK.
lastLeftUK.future: Enter a date that you last left the UK that is in the past.
lastLeftUK.change: Change what date you last left the UK

familyReunionScheme.legend: Have you come to the UK under the Family Reunion Scheme?
familyReunionScheme.required: Select yes if you have come to the UK under the Family Reunion Scheme.
familyReunionScheme.change: Change whether you came to the UK under the Family Reunion Scheme
